mappings.UDS3_value: 5i1. Alien limb consistent with CBS__Left | 52i. Alien limb consistent with CBS__Right

mappings.note: ALIENLIMB maps to 0 ONLY if BOTH ALIENLML is blank/NA and ALIENLMR is blank/NA
ALIENLIMB maps to 1 if ALIENLML==1 OR ALIENLMR==1
ALIENLIMB only maps to 8 when both ALIENLML==8 AND ALIENLMR==8
ALIENLIMB maps to 'Absent' ONLY if both ALIENLML=='<BLANK>' AND ALIENLMR=='<BLANK>'
ALIENLIMB maps to 'Present' if ALIENLML=='1 Yes' OR ALIENLMR=='1 Yes'
ALIENLIMB only maps to 'Not Assessed' when both ALIENLML=='8 Not assessed' AND ALIENLMR=='8 Not assessed'
ADRC must decide appropriate merging and mapping

mappings.UDS3_value: 5f1. Apraxia consistent with CBS__Left | 5f2. Apraxia consistent with CBS__Right

mappings.note: LIMBAPRAX maps to 0 ONLY if BOTH APRAXL is blank/NA and APRAXR is blank/NA
LIMBAPRAX maps to 1 ONLY if APRAXL==1 XOR APRAXR==1
LIMBAPRAX only maps to 8 when both APRAXL==8 AND APRAXR==8
LIMBAPRAX maps to 'Absent' ONLY if both APRAXL=='<BLANK>' OR APRAXR=='<BLANK>'
LIMBAPRAX maps to 'Focal or Unilateral' ONLY if APRAXL=='1 Yes' XOR APRAXR=='1 Yes'

ADRC must decide if bilateral mapping is to 'Bilateral & Largely Symmetric' or 'Bilateral & Largely Asymmetric'; LIMBAPRAX only maps to 'Bilateral & Largely Symmetric' or 'Bilateral & Largely Asymmetric' when both APRAXL=='1 Yes' AND APRAXR=='1 Yes'
LIMBAPRAX only maps to 'Not Assessed' when both APRAXL=='8 Not assessed' AND APRAXR=='8 Not assessed'
